analysis.description:
DigitalGame.sendInviteDividends has external calls inside a loop:
	- userRecomms[j].transfer(msg.value * GENERATION_REWARD[j] / 1000) (/unique_contracts/0x05d1319bd85736952dec658a3063f65a5910d750.sol#273-276)

DigitalGame.issueReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- WaitAwardBets[m].addr.transfer(reward) (/unique_contracts/0x05d1319bd85736952dec658a3063f65a5910d750.sol#427-428)
Parameter '_RECOMM_ADDR' of DigitalGame.setDefaultRecommAddr (/unique_contracts/0x05d1319bd85736952dec658a3063f65a5910d750.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_SPARE_RECOMM_ADDR' of DigitalGame.setSpareRecommAddr (/unique_contracts/0x05d1319bd85736952dec658a3063f65a5910d750.sol) is not in mixedCase
